titleInfo.title: Copies of letters from Lewis Pelly to the Military Department, Bombay and the Foreign Department, Government of India.

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: The file has been foliated using a pencil number enclosed in a circle in the top right hand corner of the recto of each folio. There is a former foliation sequence, using the same system of foliation, except that the numbers have been crossed through to indicate they are no longer in use.Binding: Folios 1-10 are tied together with their original binding of pink ribbon.

mods.abstract: Correspondence to and from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Secretary to the Government of India, Foreign Department and Colonel John Alexander Matthew Macdonald, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, Military Department.The correspondence relates to the measures taken by Pelly in regard to the administration of the Baroda state, the approval by the Government of India of these measures; and Pelly's thanks to the Government of Bombay and the military officials stationed in Baroda for their assistance in all military matters.
